attic.build-three: node scripts/build3modules.js; babel --plugins transform-es2015-modules-systemjs etc/threelibs -d etc/threelibs

scripts.clean: rm -rf lib test/lib test/scripts docs etc
scripts.zip: rm asx.zip; zip -r asx.zip etc src lib test test.html scripts
scripts.build: npm run build-src && npm run build-docs && npm run build-deps
scripts.build-deps: mkdir -p etc/threelibs; cp node_modules/lzma/src/lzma.js node_modules/lzma/src/lzma_worker.js node_modules/pako/dist/pako.min.js node_modules/systemjs/dist/system.js node_modules/three/build/three.js node_modules/three/build/three.min.js node_modules/three/examples/js/controls/OrbitControls.js node_modules/three/examples/js/controls/FlyControls.js node_modules/three/examples/js/controls/FirstPersonControls.js node_modules/three/examples/js/libs/stats.min.js node_modules/three/examples/js/libs/dat.gui.min.js etc; cp node_modules/webgl-debug/index.js etc/webgl-debug.js
scripts.build-as: mkdir lib; babel --plugins transform-es2015-modules-systemjs src -d lib
scripts.build-src: npm run build-as && npm run build-test && npm run bundle
scripts.build-test: mkdir test/lib test/scripts; babel --plugins transform-es2015-modules-systemjs test/apps -d test/lib && scripts/buildscripts
scripts.watch: npm run build-as -- --watch & npm run build-test -- --watch & npm run bundle -- --watch
scripts.Comment: Change vx.x.x, then run git-tag. Update version: above too
scripts.git-prep: npm run build && git add --all && git status
scripts.git-commit: git commit -v && git push origin master --follow-tags
scripts.make-page: git merge master && npm run clean && npm run build && git add --all && git add -f docs lib test/lib test/scripts etc && git commit -m 'master merge'
scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && npm run make-page && git push origin gh-pages --follow-tags && git checkout master
scripts.now: npm run clean && npm run build && now && now alias
